sentences.english: About 20 farmers and 45 hectares around Danyang were affected.

sentences.english: Danyang wine Ganlie mellow, thanks to practice good water lake.

sentences.english: Danyang Zhao but perhaps he can be tailored to Balao wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 但赵丹阳或许可以得到巴老为他量身定做的至理名言。

sentences.english: Xu often sought advice from park of Dan Yang city to run the expert of place designedly for this.
sentences.chinese: 徐老为此特意咨询了丹阳市园林管理处的专家。

sentences.english: Xunda is situated in the southern part of Jiangsu Province and in the middle of the Shanghai-Nanjing expressway.
sentences.chinese: 工厂位于沪宁高速公路中段的江苏省丹阳市界牌镇。

sentences.english: Japanese Army attacking Danyang one of the strategic towns defending Nanking.
